message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $60. How about we meet in the middle of my previous offer and your offer, at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get as close to $80 as possible.
I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $80, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. Let's finalize the deal at this price!
